text: Foustown is an unincorporated community in West Manchester Township, York County, Pennsylvania, United States. Foustown is located at (39.9950974, -76.7716341).. Retrieved on 2 December 2008. It lies 502 feet (153 m) above sea level. This region of York County is known to have an abundance of clay, which is the main reason potters from Europe settled here in the late 18th and early 19th centuries. == References == Category:Unincorporated communities in York County, Pennsylvania Category:Unincorporated communities in Pennsylvania
title: Foustown, Pennsylvania
